definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
contradictions between ourselves and the enemy/Either you are for us or against us.
internal contradiction among the people (pretext for a purge)
pinyin: ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4

definition: On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
containing_words.word: 正確處理人民內部矛盾

definition: tensions between mainland China and Hong Kong (since 1997)
to be at loggerheads/to have a falling out

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解決供需矛盾可從兩個方面着手，首先是減少需求。

sentences.english: So how can engineers balance the conflicting demands?
sentences.chinese: 工程師們如何尋找其中矛盾的結合點呢？

sentences.english: Objective To allocate a full-time toll collector in each medical unit and resolve the disputes due to medical charge.
sentences.chinese: 目的通過設立病區專職收費員，解決收費矛盾。

sentences.english: The doctrine of the meaninglessness of contradictions runs away back.
sentences.chinese: 這種關於矛盾是無意義的教條早已有之。

sentences.english: 'You have this continuous struggle between domestic and European politics, ' Mr. Brzeski said.
sentences.chinese: 布熱斯基說，國內和歐洲政治之間持續存在矛盾。

sentences.english: Directness and indirectness form a contradiction, but, on the other hand, they are united into a whole.
sentences.chinese: 直接與間接是矛盾的，同時又是統一的。

sentences.english: Industrial class conflict was a symptom of anomie .
sentences.chinese: 工業階級矛盾就是一種反常的症象。

sentences.english: Opposite forces represent two qualities, not alike , that are contradictory.
sentences.chinese: 奇正兩字，是代表着二種不同性質的事物的矛盾。

sentences.english: Paradoxically, the principle of voluntary join caused a low attendance of farmers.
sentences.chinese: 農村合作醫療參保率與農民自願參加的矛盾。

sentences.english: He denies that his prophecy is self-denying.
sentences.chinese: 他對於自己的預言是自相矛盾的說法予以了否定。

sentences.english: He laid special stress on analysing the particularity of the contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 他重點分析了這一矛盾的特殊性。

sentences.english: In this case, I believe the two are not inconsistent.
sentences.chinese: 對於這個問題，我相信兩者並不矛盾。

sentences.english: It's a paradox that Hot Money rushed in online game industry.
sentences.chinese: 熱錢湧入網遊行業，這是一個矛盾的話題。

sentences.english: The Bastard Fairies could be termed an oxymoron.
sentences.chinese: “私生的仙女”也許應該被定義爲一種矛盾。

sentences.english: Contemporary society, people have produced the serious self-contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 當代社會人的自我矛盾甚至自我分裂已是災難性問題。

sentences.english: This distribution is not inconsistent with the counterflow hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 這種分配並不與逆向流動假說相矛盾。

definition: conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
to dispute/to disagree/to argue opinionatedly/to wrangle
to intensify/to become acute/to come to a head
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
internal contradiction among the people (pretext for a purge)
pinyin: ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
